meanings.definition: A chemical compound containing a six-carbon chain.
meanings.sent1: Hexyls are molecules with a chain of six carbons.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study hexyls to understand their properties better.
meanings.sent3: The hexyls in the lab were having a party, bonding with other compounds.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, hexyls are like the sturdy backbone of a chain.
meanings.sent5: The hexyls stood out in the chemical mixture, their six-carbon chain shining brightly.

meanings.definition: The group of compounds derived from hexane.
meanings.sent1: Hexyls are important in the field of chemistry for their various uses.
meanings.sent2: The hexyls produced from hexane have unique properties.
meanings.sent3: At the hexane factory, workers were busy creating different hexyls.
meanings.sent4: The hexyls, like siblings, shared similarities but also distinct characteristics.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the hexyls formed a colorful group, each with its own identity.
